price: 27. Mpe tokelaki ba djini(1) liboso na moto ya molunge makasi.
arabic: وَٱلۡجَآنَّ خَلَقۡنَٰهُ مِن قَبۡلُ مِن نَّارِ ٱلسَّمُومِ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: wal-jāna khalaqnāhu min qablu min nāri al-samūmi
